{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'matuamauku',.whakam\u0101oritanga: He huruwhenua toro nuku, toro rākau rānei, he rau kākāriki kitakita, he karera rānei, he rau angiangi, he whakatīaho, he huruhuru kore.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'manini', 'bra.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka hinga me te rere i te mata (o tētahi wāhi) mō tētahi wā poto i te kore e ū pai (o ngā waewae, o te aha atu rānei) ki taua mata; ka taka (tētahi mea) i te kore e mau kia tina.
tauira: I a mātou e heke haere ana i te hiwi, kātahi ka karawhiu te ua, ka tino manini rawa atu te ara.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'M\u0101tahi',.whakam\u0101oritanga: Te marama tekau mā tahi o te tau.
tauira: Ko te Mātahi te marama o waenganui o te ngahuru.

{'root_number':3, 'trunk':'m\u0101t\u010.whakam\u0101oritanga: He ika tai e 30-50 henemita te tipu.

{'root_number':2, 'trunk':'matatuhi', 'b.whakam\u0101oritanga: He huinga ika e haere tahi ana.
tauira: E whāia ana te matatuhi aua e te kahawai.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'more', 'branc.whakam\u0101oritanga: Te tumu noa iho o tētahi niho, arā, kua kore katoa te wāhi o runga ake.
tauira: Ka mahi te tākuta ki te tango i te niho, ka whati, mahue ana ko te niho more.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'mimi', 'branc.whakam\u0101oritanga: He ipu hei mimi mā te tangata, ka noho mai ki te rūma moe; he hanga pēnei mā te kōhungahunga.
tauira: He pō mimi tō taku koroua i a ia e māuiui ana.
Kia ako te tamaiti ki te mimi, ki te tiko i te pō mimi, kua pai tana haere kope kore.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'moenga', 'bra.whakam\u0101oritanga: Te moenga o te tokorua kua tae ki tōna mutunga i te mea kua mate tētahi o rāua.
tauira: Mā te moenga tārā rā anō e mawehe ai rāua - he pērā rawa te nui o tō rāua aroha ki a rāua anō.
